operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO photo_datas (file_id, photo_type, dc_id, volume_id, local_id, access_hash, width, height, bytes) VALUES (:file_id, :photo_type, :dc_id, :volume_id, :local_id, :access_hash, :width, :height, :bytes)

operation.name: SelectByFileID
operation.sql: SELECT id, file_id, photo_type, dc_id, volume_id, local_id, access_hash, width, height, bytes FROM photo_datas WHERE file_id = :file_id LIMIT 1
